ygData.subject: Solo Question
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail, brothers and sisters... A question of my more accomplished fellows: where might I find good solo hunting at level 25? I fear that I ve been driving
ygData.messageBody:
Hail, brothers and sisters...

A question of my more accomplished fellows: where might I find good solo
hunting at level 25? I fear that I've been driving myself insane trying to
keep up with friends in my regular group (where they find the time to level
the way they do is beyond me <g>) and I'm letting the joy of the game seep
out (and I play on the Test Server so it's sometimes very difficult to find
a group). I'd like information on some places where I could possibly keep up
my development at my own pace. Alas, I realize EQ is meant to be a group
game, and I will group when I'm able, but rather than quit playing entirely,
I'll have to spend some solo time. Any input would be greatly appreciated!

Owyn Abhaya, Ashen Order
Test Server
